system.description:
Features

Ethereal, spaceborne creatures

Fiery, pulsing glow

Drives

Ride the drifts

Move together in dizzying patterns of light

Seek out sources of energy

Tactics

Surround and envelop

Absorb energy

In the depths of space where light and warmth are commodities, ember wisps congregate around sources of energyâ€”such as the engine wake of a starship. Their dazzling display of light and motion is an alluring sight for an isolated spacer. But they also pose a potential threat; they can envelop the hull of a vessel, leeching the starship of precious energy.

Quest Starter:

Along a remote passage, a swarm of ember wisps left a cargo ship stranded and without power. What crucial and time-sensitive cargo does this ship carry? Who races against you to secure it?
